Package com.aprzybysz.library.api.controller

Class BookRestController

java.lang.Object
com.aprzybysz.library.api.controller.BookRestController
@RestController
@RequestMapping("/api/books")
public class BookRestController
extends java.lang.Object
Controls GET HTTP requests mapped by "/api/books". Returns data from DataProvider's cache from external JSON files
Author:
Andrzej Przybysz

  • Constructor Details

    • BookRestController

      public BookRestController​(BookService service, BookMapper mapper)

  • Method Details

    • getAll

      @GetMapping public java.util.List<BookDTO> getAll()
      Handles GET request for the main mapping
      Returns:
      a list of all Books mapped to DTO by BookMapper

    • getByIsbn

      @GetMapping("/isbn/{isbn}") public BookDTO getByIsbn​(@PathVariable("isbn") java.lang.String isbn)
      Handles GET request for the "/isbn" mapping
      Parameters:
      isbn - text value representing the ISBN of a book
      Returns:
      a Book found by the given ISBN mapped to DTO by BookMapper. If none is found, the 404 status code is returned.

    • getByCategory

      @GetMapping("/category/{category}") public java.util.List<BookDTO> getByCategory​(@PathVariable("category") java.lang.String category)
      Handles GET request for the "/category" mapping
      Parameters:
      category - represents a value from book's categories array
      Returns:
      a list Books found by the given category mapped to DTO by BookMapper
